content:
Welcome!

My name is Charles Karpati, though some know me as Carlos. A lifelong Marylander since â€™94, I'm passionate about music, technology, and everything the great outdoors has to offer. You can find my CV on Github.


Use this page to explore my past works, my blog, or any of these topical notes:


Data Science Explore the world of data analysis, machine learning, and statistical techniques.
Software Learn about software development principles, tools, and best practices.
Web Development Dive into front-end and back-end web development concepts, frameworks, and technologies.
Labs Check out my Python notebooks and experimental projects.

Past Hobby Projects

Over the years, I've developed several interesting projects, including:


A-Maze-Ring Create 3D printable mazes that you can wear as a ring!
Shp2stl Turns maps or svgs 3D printable compartmentalized boxes.
EucApp A webapp to connect to electric unicycles.
RideMap Visualizing electric unicycle GPS data.
RecapsRobot An automated system for generating telegram chat recaps, summaries, and more
EasyJobApps Generates PDF tailored resumes given a job description and an optional chat with a bot.
Legal CaseTools Tools for legal professionals to manage case data and documents.
DJ Panel A customizable DJ interface for music selection and mixing.
iTunes Music Explorer Explore iTunes RSS feed of top selling tracks by country and category.
Goofy Soundboard A fun soundboard with a variety of humorous audio clips.
AI Website Generator An AI-powered platform for generating websites based on user input.


Feel free to explore these fun creations!

Published Libraries

If you're a developer, you might find my libraries useful. I have published packages on:


PyPI Explore my Python libraries published on PyPI for various utilities and tools.
NPM Find my JavaScript packages and libraries on NPM.


Currently, I'm working on:


vanillaPivotTable A lightweight, no-dependency pivot table solution for your data analysis needs.
Bundless A modern bundling tool for fast, efficient web development workflows.
PivotSync A tool to sync pivot tables across different environments and systems.

A few projects and libraries I did not list. The few that come to mind revolve around lights, my time at voxels, and libraries from BNIA and Addy-AI.
